Description: Caricature was made by our illustrator, not AI made.
Photo Requirements: Please provide clear close up photos with less shadows.
Angle Note: The caricature is made according to the angle of the facial photo sent by the customer.
Change Note: Changing angle with different photo = additional charges for 1 face
